attributes.action: Require schools to allow students to have access to the toilet during lessons
attributes.additional_details: It's not fair that some schools do not allow children to go to the toilet during lessons unless they have a medical condition.
attributes.background: I want the Government to require that schools allow children to go to the lavatories during school lessons.
